name: Pioppino
description: The Pioppino (Cyclocybe cylindracea), also known as Black Poplar Mushroom or Velvet Pioppini, is an excellent edible mushroom of warmer regions. It grows preferentially on poplars, willows and other hardwoods, both saprotrophically and parasitically. The fungus is native to Southern Europe and southeastern USA and is commercially cultivated. With its mild taste and firm texture, it is highly valued in Mediterranean and Asian cuisine.
